title: Rotating game mode queue now live!

replies.body: So uh, still can't access RGM in the new client, oooorrr...?

Not sure how I feel about getting One for all twice in a row after getting _ascension_ twice in a row, wasn't the point of the rotating game mode queue to ... you know ... rotate the game modes we get? At least I like one for all miles better then ascension.
Good to know that even after saying ARURF would be in the rotating game mode queue it still kinda isn't? {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
could u do doom bots but instead of crazy ability's u set the A.I like bronze lvl of play (intermediate bots) up to challenger lvl of play?
urf vs INSANE 10 TIMES STRONGER DOOMBOTS?

Urf plus one for all
urf plus hexakill
One for all plus hexakill
urf plus one for all plus hexakill 
Why don't these combinations exist yet ?
{{item:3070}}
nice of you to remove those bushes underneath the ascended, but could u have some anti spawnkill system in the left 2 and right 2 towers, the 2 second invincibility isnt enough
so did rito just forget to turn on RGM this week?
